    Neurall Network

    less than 1 minute read

    Our brain consists of neurons which are connected with each other in a complex ways,through which we are able to carry complex computations.

    If we think of these neurons as the nodes and the edges as the links between them then we can visualized neural networks as a series of connected layers that form a networks which connected
